publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-1615 Karen Whitefield: Award Won by Caldervale High Schoolâ€”That the Parliament congratulates the pupils and staff of Caldervale High School in Airdrie on their recent success in winning the Scottish Creative Spaces competition, which is organised by CITB-ConstructionSkills and which encourages pupils to redesign an area of their school, and recognises the benefits of engaging young people at an early stage in the design and construction industries.
S2M-1615 Award Won by Caldervale High School (lodged on 17 August 2004) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-1615 Award Won by Caldervale High School (lodged on 17 August 2004) Elaine Smith*
S2M-1615 Award Won by Caldervale High School (lodged on 17 August 2004) Mr Jamie Stone*
